entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:55 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 08:46 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -19.0°C
Wind: N 18 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing near noon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
